Detailed Description

This module contains classes related to the network connection.

The classes in this group are related to the BigWorld network protocol. The ServerConnection class handles logging into a BigWorld server, and sending/receiving BigWorld network messages. The Endpoint class represents a general socket connection, and is used by Mercury as well as in other places. The various streams classes are used for streaming data to and from network messages.
